pages.title: Tools
pages.text: Hexalia introduces specialized tools essential for gathering resources, performing rituals, and advancing your craft.

pages.title: Hex Focus
pages.text: A conduit of will used to activate $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/celestial_infusion)Celestial Infusion$(/l) and $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/natures_ritual)Nature’s Rituals$(/l), empower enchanted plants, and transmute deepslate into a Ritual Table.

pages.title: Mortar and Pestle
pages.text: Crushes plants and minerals to extract their properties (64 uses). Refines Core Herbs into powders/pastes and can grind Silk Fiber to String or Saltsprout to Salt.

pages.title: Athame
pages.text: A precise harvesting blade (64 uses). Extracts $(l:hexalia:resources/natural_resources#tree_resin)Tree Resin$(/l) from Dark Oak/Cottonwood, harvests $(l:hexalia:resources/herbs#lotus)Lotus Blossom$(/l) from Lotus Flower, and can craft a Ritual Brazier by sneaking and using on planks.

pages.title: Sage Pendant
pages.text: Created via a $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/natures_ritual)Nature’s Ritual$(/l) on a Celestial Crystal. Worn in the off-hand to boost experience gain; consuming XP slowly drains the pendant’s durability.
